body_html: @mrry I am also facing a similar issue when applying a dense layer just after using tf.layer.Flatten() , is there any workaround where we can use dense with some layer that is of the shape [batch_size , None] (None as the dimensions of the second shape argument keeps changing ) . I did go through your answer on stack overflow regarding the same question https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39947793/dimentions-of-layers-in-conv-net-tensorflow-valueerror-shape-of-a-new-variable but that does not seems to work in tf r1.4
